<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Tree Climber (Elf)](/Feats.aspx?ID=1413) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Elf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=58" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 43 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You've spent much of your life among the treetops and have become an expert at quickly and safely climbing them. You gain a climb Speed of 10 feet.
name: Tree Climber (Elf)
